{{Infobox location poe2 | game = poe2 | map = PE2 Krakens Eye.png | caption_map = Lower floor | image = PE2 Krakens Eye Upper.png | caption = Upper floor | name = The Kraken's Eye | type = Building | description = | exits = | sub_locations = | merchant = | innkeeper = Thorel | inhabitants = Norgund;Galian;Baru;Caedric | main_location = Port Maje Harbor | plants = | expected_level= 2 | grants_xp = yes | override_xp = | is_crit_path = no | can_camp = no | zone_id = zn_09_port_maje | internalname = AR_0902_Port_Maje_Tavern_01
AR_0903_Port_Maje_Tavern_02 | guid = 64f6a4a2-fe56-48a4-b20c-defb9fc6e68d
b2b470f8-85c2-4631-8116-c6695fd41580 | lsc = | icon = storeSign krakenseye.png }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. ==Background== The local tavern and inn, The Kraken's Eye caters to the needs of travelers and ship crews that visit the port - though the recent storm has put a dent in the owner's income. ==Points of interest== * The lower floor consists primarily of the counter and plenty of patrons milling about. * The upper floor is where the rooms are located and hosts [[Norgund]], the local fence. You can also get a free portion of [[Ripple Sponge]] from the pair near the door that leads outside. ==Rooms== Only one of the following rooms will appear, depending on the outcome of [[The Better Man]]. {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="2" | Room ! Cost ! Effect(s) |- | style="border-right:none" | [[File:portmaje_room_02.png|64px]] | style="border-left:none" | '''Bloody Mess''' | {{cp2|50}} | * -1 [[Diplomacy]] * +10% Damage |- | style="border-right:none" | [[File:portmaje_room_01.png|64px]] | style="border-left:none" | '''Skipper's Stay''' | {{cp2|50}} | * +2 [[Diplomacy]] * +2 [[Intimidate]] * +2 [[Bluff]] |} ==Characters== ;Lower floor * [[Thorel]], the owner. ;Upper floor * [[Norgund]], the local fence * [[Galian]], the troublemaker (supported by [[Baru]]). '''During [[The Slaying Face's Hunt for the Luckless Coin]]''' * {{s3}} [[Caedric]], a lonely crewmember of the ''Untold Fortune''. ==Loot== * [[Kraken's Eye]]: Can be stolen from the Kraken figure hanging on the wall. ==Gallery== PE2_The_Kraken's_Eye_Exterior.png | Building exterior {{DEFAULTSORT:Kraken's Eye, The}}
title: The Kraken's Eye
